Interface ViewConfig

All Known Implementing Classes:
View
public interface ViewConfig
ViewConfig is an interface that provides the defined and fixed configuration for most of the GUI elements, for the view aspect of the Thats Life! game.

Contains the lists of URLS for player car images and tile colors, stage titles, and other fixed elements to be used for the graphical user interface (GUI) or view aspect of the Thats Life! game.
